overview.en: GEMCHAIN (GEM) makes use of the unique characteristics of the blockchain that can't be tampered with in the distributed ledger record to build a jewelry traceability platform, to solve the problems of information traceability, anti-counterfeiting verification and mobile marketing in the process of commodity production, circulation, distribution and terminal consumption. Solve `trustworthy` problems for brand enterprises and consumers. And build a brand-new blockchain ecosystem as an optional Internet value transmission protocol in the future world, and advance the practicability and ease of use of the whole blockchain industry.
overview.zh: GEMCHAIN（GEM珠宝链）利用区块链独特的不可篡改的分布式账本记录特性，构建珠宝溯源平台，解决企业在商品生产、流转、分销、终端消费过程中的信息溯源，防伪验真，移动营销难题。为品牌企业和消费者解决“可信任”难题。并由此构建一个全新的区块链生态系统，作为未来世界可选的互联网价值传输协议，并把整个区块链行业的实用性、易用性向前推进一步。
